message: What do your cron jobs do? Share them here
Also we update cached data and statues over night
We have Php cron jobs that send emails at end of courses
I use cronjob to delete data scheduled for deletion and to refresh RSS feeds.
I have one that collect Facebook Insights data at midnight

I have more crons then I care to think about, but a short list would be... I have one that pulls in google fast flip images every 4 hours, one that pulls all new craigslist posts (got to love data mining), one that pulls in twitter data for specific topics, and one that sends me emails to analytics data from several sources once a day.
